name: Sheet
description: Modal overlay panel that slides in from any screen edge with focus trapping and backdrop

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a dialog with role=dialog and aria-modal. Title linked via aria-labelledby. Description via aria-describedby. Focus trapped within sheet. Focus returns to trigger on close.

recommendedUsage: Use for slide-in panels containing forms, settings, or supplementary content. Configure side (top, right, bottom, left) based on content type and reading direction. Include clear close affordance.
antiPatterns: Do not use for small confirmations - use Dialog or AlertDialog. Avoid very wide sheets that feel like page takeovers. Do not nest sheets.
